pageProduct.name: U by Kotex Slim Tampons Regular 16 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

U By Kotex® Regular Tampons give you all the protection you need in a slim and comfortable design. These tampons are perfect for those medium flow days. Unlike skinny jeans 'slim' means comfortable, so that makes them so much easier to use. Their slender tip means it's easier to use while offering you leakage protection with the last line of defence. Wear your favourite pair of undies without fear with U by Kotex® Tampons.

  • Leakage protection with the last line of defence
  • U BY KOTEX tampons offer period protection with oh so slender tip and slim design for easy use
  • Individually packaged with coloured twist-open wrappers
  • Perfect for medium flow days, with 11g absorbency
  • Come in handy purse packs

This product may not be right for you. Read the warning on pack before purchase and follow the instructions for use.

Last line of defence

Suitable For: Medium flow

Boxed Contents: 16 Regular slim tampons

Size: 16 Pack

Warnings

Do not use is seal is broken

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Tampon use has been associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Read and keep the enclosed information. Please do not flush product or packaging. Do not flush down the toilet. Do not use if wrapper is open or damaged.

Directions

Do not flush
